text: private static async void OnDependencyObjectChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e) { if (d is TrendChartControlMain control) { await control.TrendChartViewModel.SetChartDataAsync(control.BoardInformation, control.InspectionItem, control.InspectionItemResult); if (e.Property.Name == nameof(IsUseYAxistZeroBasedValue)) { control.TrendChartViewModel.IsUseYAxistZeroBasedValue = (bool)e.NewValue; } } 1
